title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
l have to find some replacements before it can help us. The tower belongs to a cleric of Mystra named Lenore. She is fond of gardening and experimenting on plants such as the Susser Tree.

Drink the potion Omeluum made

Before Omeluum can start the procedure, we'll need to drink a potion it made from the mushrooms we found.

Get the Ring of Mind-Shielding from Omeluum

The potion Omeluum gave us only made the parasite stronger - unlocking a strange, new power. To calm it down, Omeluum is willing
